body_html: Thanks @davefairtex I agree its painful for its a simple act of suppressing and silencing logs.Was providing quick suggestions hoping simplest logical way works with flags :-) However looking more though there are various flavors of logging, this one just hits the tensorflow/core/platform/default/logging.h.For this case used verbose logging.thanks.
body_text: Thanks @davefairtex  I agree its painful for its a simple act of suppressing and silencing logs.Was providing quick suggestions hoping simplest logical way works with flags :-) However looking more though there are various flavors of logging, this one just hits the tensorflow/core/platform/default/logging.h.For this case used verbose logging.thanks.
body: Thanks @davefairtex  I agree its painful for its a simple act of suppressing and silencing logs.Was providing quick suggestions hoping simplest logical way works with flags :-) However looking more though there are various flavors of logging, this one just hits the tensorflow/core/platform/default/logging.h.For this case used verbose logging.thanks.
